post.body: it's not just the cheese, it's spilled soup stains that stick, bread crumbs on the floor/countertop ... it's overwhelming!
get the D90! nikon rocks! the video function produces spectacular clips. superb quality. the canon 5d is pretty awesome too.
it was an awful time. each w/in a month of each other. one was 27. other coworker had a heart attack while on work trip ...
my fsa allows us to claim accupuncture, acne, and more but no sunscreen. =(
you have an email i can contact you about tour details? very unfamiliar and would love to have anxiety alleviated. planning for oct
- my dad has tons of accupuncture receipts. so you know what i'll be doing this wknd ... massive photocopying. hate FSAs ...
ginger soup is a miracle cold remedy. slice a few pieces toss into boiling water and drink several cups! it's very effective.
sxsw is super fun. went in '07, lots of great tex-mex (guero's taco bar, amy's ice cream, jackalope (pulled pork), red scoot inn
got kinda pissy at my sis. annoyed she doesnt update her addy to nyc. my mom sends me all her mail to sort! there's tax stuff, CCs, bills!
depend on corps for retirement. the sec guard in my bldg said courier didnt work long enough (yrs) to "retire." courier has steady side biz
one of the couriers in the FiDi area is getting the ax after 22 yrs of service. at least he's fully vested in pension! we can no longer
all of that studying earlier this yr & continue my industry involvement. im really nuts ... will pray/meditate for guidance. a tad anxious..
either i get up earlier, finish work b4 5, gym (hr ) & start studying at 7, not incl dinner. whew. i dont know how i managed to accomplish
i just looked at the flyer for prep course to design my own sched. it says 20-25 hrs/week of studying! 7days/wk/25 hrs = 3.5 hrs of reading!
perused another style book at BN by issac mizrahi - http://tinyurl.com/5x5ezl it's fabulous/ practical. love the idea of inspiration board
i'm totally in love with the world atlas i bought yesterday w/leftover BN GC from a few yrs ago. the maps & economic profiles amazing!!
it's snowing in NYC!! my sister just texted me ... awww. i want to play in the snow too! sf feels less appealing after coming back.
i also had to clean the dust on my desk this morning! and i color-coded my job search/networking contacts by corporate colors! insanity ..
im very OCD about being organized and keeping the apt clean. i have to clean the leftover shredded cheese my roommie leaves on the table!
and my volunteer work for industry org is piling up! and i want to get a head start on studying! haven't even replied to my mentor's email!
wrote one blog post and i still have 3-4 more i want to write but time is not on my side. tomorrow is ice skating ... then sat board games.
the atlas wont help with my studying but it'll be a nifty reference for work so im not confused on locations. w/remain GC - $5.75!
i hit up B&N earlier to buy a world atlas. im such a hard-core nerd. i found three and pared it down to one with lots of facts/figures!
thx to a coworker's comment that she should complain less and do something - she decided this class would help broaden her skills. yah!
my sis called me earlier. shes taking a class for her career next semester. it's a 5 week class, 8hrs/day every saturday. she was so proud!
and i cant give the food away. no compost bin yet. waiting for l/l's approval bc apt has no green bin so no compost bins.
my guy friend said i shouldn't rule out dating unemployed men given our economy. whatever. I have more impt things on my mind - exams!
my gma/sister are upset at my dad's "questionable behavior." my sister asks me to talk to my dad! eek. when did that become my job??
reviewing april exam ?s & answer key and i know the path to pass this exam will be even harder than the last. i can overcome this hurdle ...
im so indecisive on boots ... flat, heel or stacked. price/quality/comfort is also a big issue as is dual use ...
i hope 2009 will mean good things for passing the exam - my biggest career obstacle. also hope no more coworkers die (2 last yr!).
won "esme's" bracelet, wearable replica cuff on vampire tour from "twlight" movie!! perfect timing. just thinking about trying goth look!
a friend's party that was way too awkward. a chorizo burrito and some deep insight from joey and im finally home. low key new year's!
had the most amazing new year's - vampire tour w/Joey B the culinary genius. then headed to ferry bldg to watch fireworks. glad ditched
my friend's friend backed out on vampire tour even w/b1g1 free coupon! so im going for $7.5 stead of $15. it's strange how $$ works out. =)
passed on the pepperidge farm cookies in the kitchen! im amazed at my changing habits. opted for leftover chicken soup from yesterday. yah!
petula clark's "downtown" song makes me happy. was at walgreens all grumpy from having to figure out FSA and i heard her sweet voice. whew.
the boss isn't letting us go home early today. have my own list to things to do! shower, hit up vampire tour maybe & head over to friend's
im now down to $300 in FSA '08 i must liquidate ... already bought cough drops, pair of frames ... maybe buy blood pressure monitors. hehe
next year travel plans have to include some global cities. thinking panama canal tour and Salvador, Brazil (land of happiness!) ...
